paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

raw = ['{"name": "Drake"}', '{"name": "Travis Scott"}', '{"name": "Post Malone"}']

for entry in raw:
    print (json.loads(entry)['name'])

%pyspark

rdd = sc.parallelize(raw)
rdd.count()

rdd.map(json.loads).map(lambda entry: entry['name']).collect()

%pyspark

from datetime import datetime

top_tracks = sqlContext.read.format("parquet").load("s3://spotify-artists-kt/top-tracks/dt=2020-01-26/top-tracks.parquet")
top_tracks.printSchema()

top_tracks = top_tracks.toDF("id", "artist_id", "name", "popularity", "external_url")
top_tracks.show()

paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

audio_features = sqlContext.read.format("parquet").load("s3://spotify-artists-kt/audio-features/dt=2020-01-26/audio-features.parquet")
audio_features.printSchema()

audio_features1 = audio_features.toDF("danceability", "energy", "key", "loudness", "mode", "speechiness", "acousticness", "instrumentalness", "liveness", "valence", "tempo", "type", "id", "url", "track_href", "analysis_url", "duration_ms", "time-signature")

audio_features2 = audio_features1.select(audio_features1["danceability"], audio_features1["id"], audio_features1["acousticness"])

audio_features3 = audio_features2.filter((audio_features2["danceability"] >=0.30) & (audio_features2["acousticness"] >= 0.1)).distinct()
audio_features3.show()

paragraphs.text:
%pyspark

import pyspark.sql.functions as F

audio_features_new = audio_features1.select(audio_features1["danceability"], audio_features1["acousticness"], audio_features1["liveness"]).agg(F.avg(audio_features1["danceability"]).alias("avg.danceability"), F.max(audio_features1["acousticness"]).alias("max_acousticness"))
audio_features_new.show()


from pyspark.sql.functions import udf
from pyspark.sql.types import *

udf1 = udf(lambda e: e.upper())

@udf(returnType=BooleanType())
def udf2(e):
    if e >= 0.06:
        return True
    else:
        return False

audio_features_filtered = audio_features1.filter(udf2(audio_features1["danceability"]))
audio_features_filtered.show()

%pyspark

artists = sqlContext.read.format("parquet").load("s3://spotify-artists-kt/artists/dt=2020-01-29/artists.parquet")
artists.toDF("id", "name", "followers", "popularity", "url", "image_url")
artists.show()

import pandas as pd
import pymysql

client_id = "e90dae0c34e24d8ea957d2b18c57f258"
client_secret = "530d1a4cc0864ef9b4be53414717f538"

host = "fastcampus.ca3ahvepujnu.ap-northeast-2.rds.amazonaws.com"
port = 3306
username = "kt1201"
database = "production"
password = "ktkim134679!"

try:
    conn = pymysql.connect(host, user=username, passwd=password, db=database, port=port, use_unicode=True, charset='utf8')
    cursor = conn.cursor()
except:
    logging.error("could not connect to rds")
    sys.exit(1)

# RDS - 아티스트 데이터를 가져오고
cursor.execute("SELECT * FROM artists")

# artists로 colnames 생성
colnames = [d[0] for d in cursor.description]

# pandas 데이터프레임으로 만들고
artists = [dict(zip(colnames, row)) for row in cursor.fetchall()] # colnames와 row를 dict형태로 만들어서 row마다 artists로 넣어줌
artists = pd.DataFrame(artists)

# spark 데이터프레임으로 변형
artists = sqlContext.createDataFrame(artists)
artists.show()

top_tracks = sqlContext.read.format("parquet").load("s3://spotify-artists-kt/top-tracks/dt=2020-01-26/top-tracks.parquet")
top_tracks = top_tracks.toDF("id", "artist_id", "name", "popularity", "external_url")
top_tracks = top_tracks.withColumnRenamed("id", "track_id").withColumnRenamed("name", "track_name")
top_tracks = top_tracks.select(top_tracks['track_id'][0].alias('track_id'), top_tracks['track_name'][0].alias('track_name'), top_tracks['artist_id'], top_tracks['popularity'][0].alias('track_popularity'))

## top_tracks와 artists조인
joined = artists.join(top_tracks, top_tracks['artist_id'] == artists['id'])

audio_features = sqlContext.read.format("parquet").load("s3://spotify-artists-kt/audio-features/dt=2020-01-26/audio-features.parquet")

audio_features = audio_features.toDF("danceability", "energy", "key", "loudness", "mode", "speechiness", "acousticness", "instrumentalness", "liveness", "valence", "tempo", "type", "id", "url", "track_href", "analysis_url", "duration_ms", "time-signature")

audio_features = audio_features.withColumnRenamed("id", "track_id")
master = joined.join(audio_features, joined['track_id'] == audio_features['track_id'])
master.show()

# zeppelin 안에서 join된 데이터프레임을 가지고 TempTable 생성
master.registerTempTable("master")

only showing top 20 rows

paragraphs.text:
%sql

SELECT name, popularity, AVG(abs(popularity-track_popularity)) as diff from master WHERE name IN ('Drake', 'Post Malone') GROUP BY 1, 2 ORDER BY 3 ASC LIMIT 20

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.text:
%sql

SELECT track_popularity, COUNT(*) FROM master GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1 ASC

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.text:
%sql

SELECT AVG(acousticness), AVG(liveness), AVG(speechiness), AVG(tempo) FROM master WHERE popularity > ${popularity = 80} AND track_popularity > ${track_popularity=80}

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.text:
%sql

SELECT ROUND(danceability, 2), COUNT(*) FROM master GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1 ASC
